game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Retrieve the stolen family heirloom from the thief.
game.description: The local lord's prized possession has been stolen, and it's up to you to retrieve it. The thief is said to be hiding in the nearby forest.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and a magical amulet

task.objective: Gather information about the thief's identity.
task.description: Speak to the villagers and gather any information they may have about the thief's appearance or whereabouts.

task.objective: Track down the thief in the forest.
task.description: Follow the trail of clues and track down the thief to their hiding spot.
Confront the thief and retrieve the stolen family heirloom.
